author: USA TODAY, Dennis Wagner and Donovan Slack, USA TODAY
title: The US had a chance to learn from anthrax, SARS, H1N1 and Ebola. So why is the federal coronavirus response so messy?
description: For more than 20 years, Robert Kadlec has warned that the U.S. is not just vulnerable to a pandemic, but doomed by dysfunction if one were to strike.
content:
President Donald Trump says he's ordered the Federal Emergency Management Agency to ship mobile hospital centers to the hard-hit states of Washington, California and New York amid the coronavirus pandemic (March 22)
